segments.text: I feel so down seeing this family moment turn risky without them knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so absorbed in her routine, missing the overflow at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down, pooling around her unaware feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being mischievous, but it's heartbreaking how precarious it is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool looks like he might tumble and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face tugs at my heart; she just wants a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how the calm garden outside contrasts with the indoor trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's going to enjoy those cookies if an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the scene like a picture of innocence gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress are getting damp, adding to the melancholy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before the stool tips or someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary kitchen hides so much potential sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes wait innocently for the chaos to reach them.
segments.speaker: PAR
